pull.title: Adding test case for SINGLE|ANYONECANPAY hash type in tx_valid.json
pull.body: We are missing a test vector for SINGLE|ANYONECANPAY inside of tx_valid.json. This addresses the issue #12060

events.message: Adding test case for SINGLE|ANYONECANPAY hash type in tx_valid.json

events.body: Seems like the travis failure is unrelated?

> Seems like the travis failure is unrelated?

Yes, looks like another instance of #11777. I've restarted the job.
utACK. At least the signatures decode as [SINGLE|ANYONECANPAY] so no reason not to have more tests.
